channel.title: Project Insanity Easy Help [Rep++]
channel.description:
Hey, I need help with fixing the stats on the Ring of Charos (a). It seems as if the stats in item.cfg don't match the stats on the item, and it looks as if all other Project Insanity sources have the same exact problem that I have.
It's giving +30,000 bonuses for everything, and in item.cfg it only gives +0...
All help will be given rep++.
Thanks,
Anthony

item.title: Project Insanity Easy Help [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @Lil_wayne_fan Lil wayne fan
item.description:
@Lil_wayne_fan wrote:

There’s two isnt there? make sure you change the it on the correct one.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Insanity Easy Help [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

Comment everything in your item.cfg out, see if the ring of charos has any bonus, or any item has a bonus for that matter. If it still has stats it is most likely being pulled from the cache. You’ll need to use tom’s cache editor to fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Insanity Easy Help [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @Resent Resent
item.description:
@Resent wrote:

Cedrick- Yes, I looked for every item, and no it’s definatly not in item.cfg.

RegalX- Did you even bother to look at my topic? I specifically said that I’ve continuously looked in item.cfg, and nothing matches.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Insanity Easy Help [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @RegalX RegalX
item.description:
@RegalX wrote:

Keep looking in item.cfg.

If it helps you can just use CTRL+F and type in the rings stats which will eventually lead you to where the rings actual stats are that are affecting the game.

For example.

The fourth digit is the stab attack bonus, the 5th digit is the slash attack bonus and so on. If you just input the stats from the ring from the game and just implement them into CTRL+F in the format that item.cfg has, you may be able to find it.

Regards,

-RegalX

Read full topic

item.title: Project Insanity Easy Help [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @cedrick cedrick
item.description:
@cedrick wrote:

did u look for every ring that have the same name? maybe its a custom?

Read full topic
